text: The [[Ghaal'dar]] of [[Darguun]] are an alliance of [[goblinoid]] tribes. One such tribe, the Kapaa Dor ("Never Betray"), are old rivals of the [[Rhukaan Taash]]. They are seeking ways to form an alliance with Prince [[Oargev ir'Wynarn]] and forge [[Cyre]] and [[Darguun]] into a new nation where [[human]] and [[goblinoid]] could move forward together in peace.
title: Kapaa Dor
